com.microsoft.band.tiles.pages

Class TextBlock

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.microsoft.band.tiles.pages.PageElement<TextBlock>
      • com.microsoft.band.tiles.pages.TextBlock
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.os.Parcelable

    public final class TextBlock
extends PageElement<TextBlock>

    Class that represents a Microsoft Band text block layout element

    Contains only a single line of text

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface android.os.Parcelable

    • Constructor Detail

      • TextBlock

        public TextBlock(int originX,
         int originY,
         int width,
         int height,
         TextBlockFont font)
        Constructor that sets the bounds and font type of this text block layout element, with a default baseline of 0
        Parameters:
        originX - The value to set as the X origin of this layout element (Should be set to 0 if parent element is a FlowPanel or a ScrollFlowPanel)
        originY - The value to set as the Y origin of this layout element (Should be set to 0 if parent element is a FlowPanel or a ScrollFlowPanel)
        width - The value to set as the width of this layout element (Will be ignored if auto-width is set to true, as it is on default)
        height - The value to set as the height of this layout element
        font - TextBlockFont to set as the font of this text block layout element

      • TextBlock

        public TextBlock(int originX,
         int originY,
         int width,
         int height,
         TextBlockFont font,
         int baseline)
        Constructor that sets the bounds and font type of this text block layout element
        Parameters:
        originX - The value to set as the X origin of this layout element (Should be set to 0 if parent element is a FlowPanel or a ScrollFlowPanel)
        originY - The value to set as the Y origin of this layout element (Should be set to 0 if parent element is a FlowPanel or a ScrollFlowPanel)
        width - The value to set as the width of this layout element (Will be ignored if auto-width is set to true, as it is on default)
        height - The value to set as the height of this layout element
        font - TextBlockFont to set as the font of this text block layout element
        baseline - Value to assign to the baseline vertical pixel offset (Will not be used unless the baseline alignment type is changed to be TextBlockBaselineAlignment.RELATIVE or TextBlockBaselineAlignment.ABSOLUTE)

      • TextBlock

        public TextBlock(PageRect bound,
         TextBlockFont font)
        Constructor that sets the bounds and font type of this text block layout element, with a default baseline of 0
        Parameters:
        bound - PageRect object for setting the bounds of this layout element (Will ignore width if auto-width is set to true, as it is on default)
        font - TextBlockFont to set as the font of this text block layout element

      • TextBlock

        public TextBlock(PageRect bound,
         TextBlockFont font,
         int baseline)
        Constructor that sets the bounds and font type of this text block layout element
        Parameters:
        bound - PageRect object for setting the bounds of this layout element (Will ignore width if auto-width is set to true, as it is on default)
        font - TextBlockFont to set as the font of this text block layout element
        baseline - Value to assign to the baseline vertical pixel offset (Will not be used unless the baseline alignment type is changed to be TextBlockBaselineAlignment.RELATIVE or TextBlockBaselineAlignment.ABSOLUTE)

    • Method Detail

      • getBaseline

        public int getBaseline()

        Method to get the baseline vertical pixel offset value of this text block layout element

        Only relevant if the baseline alignment mode of this text block layout element is TextBlockBaselineAlignment.RELATIVE or TextBlockBaselineAlignment.ABSOLUTE

        Returns:
        The baseline vertical pixel offset value of this text block layout element

      • getBaselineAlignment

        public TextBlockBaselineAlignment getBaselineAlignment()
        Method to get the baseline alignment mode of this text block layout element
        Returns:
        The baseline alignment mode of this text block layout element

      • getColor

        public int getColor()

        Method to get the explicit text color of this text block layout element

        Only useful if the color source is set to ElementColorSource.CUSTOM

        The alpha value of the set color will be ignored and any returned color will always have an alpha of 0xff

        Returns:
        The explicit text color of this text block layout element

      • getColorSource

        public ElementColorSource getColorSource()
        Method to get the text color source of this text block layout element
        Returns:
        The text color source of this text block layout element

      • getFont

        public TextBlockFont getFont()
        Method to get the font used by this text block layout element
        Returns:
        The font used by this text block layout element

      • isAutoWidthEnabled

        public boolean isAutoWidthEnabled()
        Method to get whether auto-width is enabled
        Returns:
        boolean value representing whether auto-width is enabled

      • setAutoWidthEnabled

        public TextBlock setAutoWidthEnabled(boolean autoWidth)

        Method to set auto-width as enabled or disabled

        Default is enabled

        Parameters:
        autoWidth - If true, this text block will expand horizontally to fit its text content; if not, only the text that fits in the defined bounds will show
        Returns:
        this

      • setBaseline

        public TextBlock setBaseline(int baseline)

        Method to set the baseline vertical pixel offset value of this text block layout element

        Only relevant if the baseline alignment mode of this text block layout element is TextBlockBaselineAlignment.RELATIVE or TextBlockBaselineAlignment.ABSOLUTE

        Parameters:
        baseline - Value to assign to the baseline vertical pixel offset of this text block layout element
        Returns:
        this

      • setBaselineAlignment

        public TextBlock setBaselineAlignment(TextBlockBaselineAlignment baselineAlignment)

        Method to set the baseline alignment mode of this text block layout element

        If set to TextBlockBaselineAlignment.RELATIVE or TextBlockBaselineAlignment.ABSOLUTE, setBaseline(int) must be used to set a relative or absolute pixel offset value

        Parameters:
        baselineAlignment - TextBlockBaselineAlignment to set as the baseline alignment mode of this text block layout element
        Returns:
        this

      • setColor

        public TextBlock setColor(int color)

        Method to set the explicit text color of this text block layout element

        Automatically sets the text color source to ElementColorSource.CUSTOM

        Default explicit text color is Color.WHITE

        The alpha value of the set color will be ignored and any returned color will always have an alpha of 0xff

        Parameters:
        color - Color to set as the explicit text color of this text block layout element
        Returns:
        this

      • setColorSource

        public TextBlock setColorSource(ElementColorSource colorSource)

        Method to set the text color source of this text block layout element

        If set to ElementColorSource.CUSTOM, an explicit text color must be provided

        Default is ElementColorSource.CUSTOM with the explicit text color set as Color.WHITE

        Parameters:
        colorSource - ElementColorSource to set as the text color source of this text block layout element
        Returns:
        this

      • setFont

        public TextBlock setFont(TextBlockFont font)
        Method to set the font used by this text block layout element
        Parameters:
        font - TextBlockFont to set as the font of this text block layout element
        Returns:
        this
